channel.title: Has anyone heard of mandrin bots?
channel.description: so far all i know is u can make multiple accs for autoing kinda like aryan ;D

item.title: Has anyone heard of mandrin bots?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:3, topic:10503”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=15384.msg174494#msg174494 date=1156199380]
Oh, gee, your only 2 months late.

The bot is basically aryan with a few .dll’s to make it work.
[/quote]

Lol, you make it sound easy to re-create a bot like aryan. Aryan was made using the deobs, if they managed to deob they would have to re-write all the regex patterns, what fun! Of course you can make a bot diffrently, aka bytecode and bcel but they it wouldnt really be aryan as such.[/quote]

I beleve the anti randoms and scrips are aryan scripts with the orignal credits in place so it’s in some way based off of aryan.

Read full topic
item.source: Has anyone heard of mandrin bots?

Lol, you make it sound easy to re-create a bot like aryan. Aryan was made using the deobs, if they managed to deob they would have to re-write all the regex patterns, what fun! Of course you can make a bot diffrently, aka bytecode and bcel but they it wouldnt really be aryan as such.
